channel.title: Please help me!
channel.description: Ok So When I Was Adding My Shop I Got No Errors In My Compiler But When I Run My Server I Get This [code] Starting 0wnag3pk3r on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3666 3497" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAuto(NPCHandler.java:1448) at NPCHanlder.(init)(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code] Ok Please Help I Added This And My AutoSpawn.cfg [code] spawn = 1552 3666 3497 0 0 0 0 0 1 Santa [/code] Ok I Put That In AutoSpawn.cfg And In Shops.cfg I Added [code] shop = 50 @gre@The_Aff_&_M,i,k,e_Shop! 2 2 1038 1000 1040 1000 1042 1000 1044 1000 1046 1000 1048 1000 2422 1000 1050 1000 1053 1000 1055 1000 1057 1000 4587 1000 1419 1000 6889 1000 6916 1000 6918 6920 1000 6922 1000 6924 1000 [/code] And In Client.java I Added This [code] else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Santa PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; //The Aff & M,i,k,e Shop! } [/code] Ok Please Help Me Did I Do Somthing Wrong Please Tell Me!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:02:19 PM[/size][hr]SomeOne Please Help ME!!!!!!!!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:03:05 PM[/size][hr]Please help i beg of you

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @hero_0777 hero 0777
item.description:
@hero_0777 wrote:

Here spawn = 1552 (3666 3497) 0 0 0 0 0 1 Santa

I think u need another space or something.

Try this. spawn = 1552 3666 3497 0 0 0 0 0 1 Santa
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 11:09:05 PM[/size][hr]U didnt leave a big enough space with the 3666 and 3497

item.title: Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @_TRY_TO_STOP_ME {(TRY:TO:STOP:ME)}
item.description:
@_TRY_TO_STOP_ME wrote:

Ok So When I Was Adding My Shop I Got No Errors In My Compiler But When I Run My Server I Get This

Starting 0wnag3pk3r on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3666  3497"
           at  java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
           at  java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
           at  java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
           at  NPCHandler.loadAuto(NPCHandler.java:1448)
           at  NPCHanlder.(init)(NPCHandler.java:23)
           at  server.main(server.java:29)

Ok Please Help I Added This And My AutoSpawn.cfg

spawn = 1552	3666  3497	0	0	0	0	0	1	Santa

Ok I Put That In AutoSpawn.cfg And In Shops.cfg I Added

shop = 50	@gre@The_Aff_&_M,i,k,e_Shop!			2	2	1038	1000	1040	1000	1042	1000	1044	1000	1046	1000	1048	1000	2422	1000	1050	1000	1053	1000	1055	1000	1057	1000	4587	1000	1419	1000	6889	1000	6916	1000	6918	6920	1000	6922	1000	6924	1000

And In Client.java I Added This

else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Santa
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 50; //The Aff & M,i,k,e Shop!
}

Ok Please Help Me Did I Do Somthing Wrong Please Tell Me!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:02:19 PM[/size][hr]SomeOne Please Help ME!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 10:03:05 PM[/size][hr]Please help i beg of you
